token_info.name: sewn by Jared Schiffman (1998-; p5js/NFT version, 4.2021) [beta release]
token_info.description: sewn is an exploration of balanced recursive division of two-dimensional space created by Jared Schiffman in 1998. Using the three mouse buttons (or alternately arrow keys and space) the canvas can be manipulated to create or remove rectangles vertically and horizontally. Balance is maintained with rectangles coming to rest to have equal areas throughout. restoration port by @dribnet 2021 - https://dribnet.github.io/sewn/
